title.narrative: Climate Change and Environmental Sector Programme Support Phase III

description.narrative: The programme addresses three major sustainability challenges in Mozambique: the impacts of climate change affecting rural and urban areas, environmental and natural resource management, and rapidly growing urbanization. The three Development Engagements support duty bearers and rights-holders at central and local levels to work with these issues. This includes the consolidation of the environmental and climate change framework through the Ministry of Environment and mainstreaming into key sectors, support to climate change resilience, urban management and democratic governance through a joint municipal development programme, and support to a civil society support mechanism promoting social transparency in natural resource management, environmental protection and climate change. As a transition programme, focus is on consolidation of achievements of the previous sector support and preparing a for a Green Growth theme in the upcoming Country Programme.
